title: Ticket #2882: Remove DMTCP boilerplate environment from submit file
description:
From Michael Hanke:

Along this line of reducing boilerplate code vanilla snapshoting: Is there a way to safely merge these settings into the shim_script itself, as they are only passed on to dmtcp, and seem to have values of general validity: 

  environment=DMTCP_TMPDIR=./;DMTCP_PREFIX_ID=$(CLUSTER)_$(PROCESS)
remarks:
2012-Mar-12 11:55:56 by adesmet:
This seems like a good idea. Minor detail: ensure that the shim script checks for the environment variables before setting them. If they've been set, it suggests the user intentionally did so and we shouldn't override their intent.
creator: adesmet
